title: Need a Code & Conduct Board
body: Personally, I think that there needs to be a board for people to discuss rules, how to follow them, and suggestions for new ones to be implemented.

replies.body: There really aren't any specific game rules, other than the obvious ones that every single video game on the internet uses. I feel like somewhere on the internet a Rioter has posted a list of unofficial rules that people should follow, but it's really pretty simple. My unofficial list of rules is in the window that comes up when reporting someone in-game. Other than a few, such as "Unskilled player," most of those are punishable offences and should be avoided.

That's what I mean though. There ought to be a written out code of conduct with maybe a board to discuss the way certain rulings should be upheld, like what constitutes a chat restriction or a game ban. I just think that if there are going to be rules, we the players ought to have a say in what they are.
If you're talking about rules on this platform (boards), you can do that in this section!
No, I meant like the game rules.
